channel.title: Zone 5 Sports
channel.description: Three guys talking sports while boozin' it up! Oh yeah, there's always the chance of a THONG bet being placed. And it's always someone's Momma that did it. Don't miss the JACKHOLE of the Week AWARD!!
channel.itunes:subtitle: 3 yards and a cloud of curse words.
channel.itunes:author: Jason Hoopman

item.title: Hoop, Hammer, and The Talking Walnut
item.description: Thong Bets are a plenty!! Today's topics: NHL Playoffs: NBA Playoffs: Dakota Dowd: Yep, we're pulling at the heart strings! Kentucky Derby: Hoop and Hammer are not really into the Horses, but what the hell, it is a big sporting event. Earl/Tiger Woods: Thong Bet: JackHole of the Week: Pump it? Or Dump it? Click on play and ENJOY!!!

item.title: Hoop, Hammer, and The Talking Walnut
item.description: New Name/New Show/Good Times!! Todays Topics: A ton of NFL Talk, including the Draft. NBA/Playoffs/Awards. NHL Playoffs. Thong Bet. Jackhole of the Week: Marti Turrcoo, if that's how you spell it!! Pump it? Or Dump it? The part of the show where Smig asks Hoop and Hammer if they would Pump it (Be For it), or Dump it (Be against it). Enjoy the SHOW!!!!

item.title: Hoop & Hammer Show #10 - Smig Hosting
item.description: Welcome Smig to the show!! New format, check it out and let us know what you think? We cover a ton of topics today and apologize if it's a little long. We'll cut it down for future shows, but what the hell, we were flowin', so back off!! Click on the spinning football and ENJOY!
item.dc:creator: Jason Hoopman
item.itunes:summary:
Welcome Smig to the show!! New format, check it out and let us know what you think?
We cover a ton of topics today and apologize if it's a little long. We'll cut it down for future shows, but what the hell, we were flowin', so back off!!
Click on the spinning football and ENJOY!

item.title: Hoop & Hammer Show #7

item.title: Hoop & Hammer Show #6
item.description: The Vikings Chopper is better than a picture of Hammer in a Thong right? Todays Topics: Alfonso Soriano: T.O.: Seems like we can't not talk about his dumb ass. Tank Carter: Vikings vs. Seahawks: Hutchinson - Burleson Vince Young: Is he fast enough? Shawn Kemp: Comeback Kid? NCAA Update: Did someone shoot Adam Morrison's dog? Jackhole of the Week? Click on the spinning football and ENJOY!!

item.title: Hoop & Hammer Show #4
item.description: I sincerely apologize. Hammer wanted to make sure this "Thong Bet" picture was posted. Yes he did loose the Thong Bet, but DAMN!!!! Did we really need to see this shit!!!?????? Oh yeah, and the Gopher is to recognize the Gopher's Hockey dominance, Mutha Fackoo's. Okay, back to business, short show. Today's Topics: Kirby Puckett: Team USA Basketball: NFL CBA: Minnesota Timberwolves: Carl Eller: Bonds In Drag: Wonderlic Test: Thong Bet, I think we did a couple?: JackHole of the Week: Gene Upshaw and Paul Tagliabue.
item.dc:creator: Jason Hoopman
item.itunes:summary:
I sincerely apologize. Hammer wanted to make sure this "Thong Bet" picture was posted. Yes he did loose the Thong Bet, but DAMN!!!! Did we really need to see this shit!!!?????? Oh yeah, and the Gopher is to recognize the Gopher's Hockey dominance, Mutha Fackoo's.
Okay, back to business, short show. Today's Topics:
Kirby Puckett:
Team USA Basketball:
NFL CBA:
Minnesota Timberwolves:
Carl Eller:
Bonds In Drag:

item.title: Hoop & Hammer Show #3
item.description: It's on! The Hammer is in full force tonight fella's!! Today's topics, hopefully I remember exactly what the hell we talked about?: Barry Bonds/Retirement/The Clear Jerry Rice/Dancing with the Stars/WTF Should college athletes be paid?: NCAA Basketball Update from "Fear the Stache" guy!! I think Hammer confesses to being the dude that threw the cup of ice at Ron Artest!! And random rants! Enjoy, click the spinning football to listen.
